actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide health care practitioners in rural areas with training in preventive health care, including both physical and mental care, and for other purposes.
short_title: Rural Preventive Health Care Training Act of 1997

summary.text: Rural Preventive Health Care Training Act of 1997 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize grants and contracts to provide preventive health care training to health care practitioners practicing in rural areas. Requires that the training, to the extent practicable, include training to prevent both physical and mental disorders. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Rural Preventive Health Care Training Act of 1997

A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to provide health care practitioners in rural areas with training in preventive health care, including both physical and mental care, and for other purposes.
